overview: Contact page for Digital Experience Healthcare allowing users to view contact information and submit inquiries via a form. Includes success and error banners, accessibility features, and theme toggle.
interactions: Click skip-to-content link to jump to main content
Submit contact form to trigger success or error banner visibility
Navigate between pages using navbar links
data_flow: User enters data in contact form fields
On success, success-banner is shown and form cleared
On failure, error-banner is shown with guidance
Dismissal of banners hides them from view
accessibility: ARIA roles and labels on navigation and banners
test_ideas: Verify skip-to-content link moves focus to main content
Validate navbar links navigate correctly and active state updates
Test theme toggle changes visual theme and persists state if applicable
Submit form with valid data and confirm success-banner appears
Submit form with invalid data and confirm error-banner appears
Ensure banner-close buttons hide banners and restore focus appropriately
Check accessibility attributes (aria-live, aria-label) are present and functional
Confirm analytics events fire on key interactions
